charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1101_0100_2:
Hilbert invited [Name:PlayerNickname ]
to what ended up being a fierce battle
against Kyurem.
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_0200_1:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We had a fantastic battle—all thanks to you!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_0300_1:
Seems Kyurem’s even more pumped
than usual!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_0401_0500_1:
You guys were, too! I couldn’t help but
lose myself in battle!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_0402_0700_1:
That’s my line, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We would’ve been up against the ropes if
we let our guard down for even a moment!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_0800_1:
That battle was super helpful for finding
things to improve on, too!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_0900_1:
If I want to be strong, I’ll have to work
even harder.
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1000_1:
Lately, when N and I battle on Pasio,
folks have been calling us heroes...
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1100_1:
so I’ve gotta do my best to not put that title
to shame!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1200_1:
Hm? You wanna know how long I’ve known
Kyurem?
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1300_1: Well, we met here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1400_1:
But this Kyurem fused with my Reshiram,
which I met back in Unova.
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1500_1:
From now on, I have to live up to
everyone’s expectations—even with
new partners!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1600_1:
I feel like you’re gonna be key in that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1700_1:
You haven’t treated me any differently since
I became Neo Champion.
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1800_1:
I’m so glad to have a friend like you, who’s
always down to train and have fun battling.
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_1900_1:
That’s why I keep putting so much effort into
getting stronger...
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_2000_1:
Because I want to keep having awesome
battles—battles that light a flame inside us!
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_2500_1: From now on, as friends and rivals...
charaepi_ch0020_90_toya/2301_1201_2600_1:
We’ll inspire each other to get even stronger,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
